code: import{PRODUCT_GROUP_FAIL,PRODUCT_GROUP_REQUEST,PRODUCT_GROUP_SUCCESS,ADD_PRODUCT_FAIL,ADD_PRODUCT_REQUEST,ADD_PRODUCT_SUCCESS,PRODUCT_GROUP_LIST_REQUEST,PRODUCT_GROUP_LIST_FAIL,PRODUCT_GROUP_LIST_SUCCESS}from"../constants/productConstants";export var productGrouplistReducer=function productGrouplistReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{loading:true};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case PRODUCT_GROUP_LIST_REQUEST:return{loading:true};case PRODUCT_GROUP_LIST_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,listproducts:action.payload};case PRODUCT_GROUP_LIST_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};default:return state;}};export var productGroupReducer=function productGroupReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case PRODUCT_GROUP_REQUEST:return{loading:true};case PRODUCT_GROUP_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,productGroupInfo:action.payload};case PRODUCT_GROUP_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};default:return state;}};export var addProductReducer=function addProductReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ADD_PRODUCT_REQUEST:return{loading:true};case ADD_PRODUCT_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,productAdd:action.payload};case ADD_PRODUCT_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};default:return state;}};
